# File lib/settings.rb, line 6
  def self.method_missing(method, *args)
    method_name = method.to_s
    
    if method_name.include? '='
      #set a value for a variable
      var_name = method_name.gsub('=', '')
      value = args.first
      self[var_name] = value
    else
      #retrieve a value
      self[method_name]
    end
  end
